topic.title: Post Your Ideas For Apps
topic.body: It's clear that ZeroNet have a bright future. Please, post your application ideas that you want to see within the network. Developers like me can pick up your brain to implement these.

1_1JgHfDK4eojCkVZHKey9hiMAcAc9mxMUK2.body:
> [tkarita](#comment_132_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): replacement for webtorrent/IPFS, contained within ZeroNet
> distributed computing
> caching proxy for clearnet

Thanks tkarita. These are very high-level ideas. I was thinking along for apps like ZeroBoard, ZeroBlog that can have immediate effect and has a lower barrier to implement.
